name: Sales Order and Purchase Order
query:
SELECT 
  `tabSales Order`.name as "ID:Link/Sales Order:200",
  `tabSales Order`.customer_name as "Customer Name:Link/customer:200",
  `tabSales Order`.company as "Company:Link/DocType:200",
  `tabSales Order`.territory as "Territory:Link/DocType:200",
  `tabSales Order`.to_date as "Date:Link/DocType:200",
 `tabSales Order`.delivery_date as "Delivery Date:Link/DocType:200",
`tabSales Order`.shipping_address as "Shipping Address:Link/DocType:200",
`tabSales Order`.customer_address as "Customer Address:Link/DocType:200",
`tabSales Order`.contact_person as "Contact Person:Link/DocType:200",
`tabSales Order`.status as "status:Link/DocType:200",
`tabSales Order`.grand_total as  "Grand Total:Link/DocType:200"
FROM 
    `tabSales Order`
WHERE
    `tabSales Order`.status = 'Draft'
